game.name: Quintillion Quest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A non-linear active incremental game. Press buttons, make numbers go bigger. And even bigger. Will you fail the run or reach a quintillion?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A non-linear active incremental game. Press buttons, make numbers go bigger. And even bigger. Will you fail the run or reach a quintillion?
